Text: I'm doing something wrong.  I've followed step-by-step 3 times and it says Invalid Key.  I'm putting in NoJuan and JohnWho and using random numbers like 123456789.  Clearly I'm missing something simple...
i tried the patch and it worked but when i burned it tried to make me re-register and wouldnt work so patch or a serial update may be neccessary

I got it working just by putting jibberish into the registration and serial key boxes and hitting register. It took a few seconds but it came up with registration successfull.


My understanding on how the patch works is to remove the programs need to chech that the registration details ARE genuine. Hence, it sees that there is SOMETHING in each field and assuems that they are correct --> then enabling registration.
Dunno what u all are talking about but the serial is correct, works the best. TY uploader :))

well i put the patch in the (C:\Program Files (x86)\ImTOO\Blu-ray Creator 2) and click on patch but nothing happens so i'm thinking its patched and i go and put johnwho and a key of 123456789 and nothing happens it says invalid key. What am i doing Wrong ?
It use to work, then a few days ago it randomly told me I was unregistered. Can't get it to work again
Does not work with Windows 7 64 bit.
